name: Space (jasonzh, jp5169, oscarivanramirez)
description: This is an adventure game where you play as an astronaut in space. You come to find out aliens are attacking Earth now your job is to fight against them. Your spaceship is equipped with weapons powerful enough to destroy their spaceships. Just make sure not to get hit or you will take serious damage. There will be many obstacles along the way, but nothing will stop you.
